justification: The Offering ('Not all those who wander are lost.') and Interfaces ('The pirate ship was haunted by the ghost of a former captain.') do not address the requirement for recording events, transactions, or access data in a Digital Twin system. There is no explicit or implicit mention of relevant capabilities.
ability: The ability to record events, transactions, access data of users, and transactions to understand and trace the activities occurring in a Digital Twin system.
